NAME: Quickflame
DESCRIPTION: Deal a small amount of fire damage to an enemy. Does not skip the turn.

NAME: Ice Bolt
DESCRIPTION: Deal some ice damage to an enemy.

NAME: Mana Barrier
DESCRIPTION: Spend 30% of your mana to gain a shield equivalent to 30% of your MAXHP.

NAME: Meditate
DESCRIPTION: Meditate, recovering some amount of MP.

NAME: Thunder Spear
DESCRIPTION: Deal both physical and magical thunder damage to an enemy.
